summary: This is an email chain from July 5, 2020, discussing scheduling of daily morning calls and specific meetings, including one concerning the 'Epstein Trust' and a 'Press Office' meeting. It indicates ongoing administrative or legal work related to Epstein matters years after his death.

persons.name: Geoff
persons.context: Mentioned as someone who used to hang out in the sender's office when he first arrived, establishing a past working relationship that the current morning call habit is emulating.

events.title: Scheduling of Epstein Trust and Press Office Meetings
events.description: Email correspondence arranging a daily morning call habit and confirming meetings, including a 1:15 PM call about the 'Epstein Trust' and Press Office WebEx meetings on Monday/Tuesday.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated July 5, 2020, showing administrative activity related to Epstein years after his 2019 death.
It references a scheduled call concerning the 'Epstein Trust', indicating ongoing legal or financial proceedings related to Epstein's estate.
It mentions 'Press Office' meetings, suggesting continued public relations or media strategy work connected to the Epstein case.
The correspondence establishes a routine of daily morning coordination calls among the recipients, emulating a past habit with a colleague named Geoff.
